scenario: The Motley Fool's board of directors includes Randi Zuckerberg, a former Facebook director and sister to Meta Platforms CEO Mark Zuckerberg, and Suzanne Frey, an executive at Alphabet. The company's analyst Parkev Tatevosian has positions in Alphabet, Visa, and Walt Disney. The Motley Fool recommends and has positions in Advanced Micro Devices, Alphabet, Fiverr International, Meta Platforms, Netflix, Nvidia, Uber Technologies, UiPath, Visa, Walt Disney, and Zoom Communications.
